question: Can skin picking phenotype present following methylphenidate treatment?
ideal_answer: Newly Developed Skin Picking After Methylphenidate Treatment in Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.

snippets.text: Newly Developed Skin Picking After Methylphenidate Treatment in Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder: Possible Mechanisms.
We describe a case of skin picking developing after methylphenidate therapy for ADHD.
